recommendation_service.optimization_model.utils.weather_data

Module Contents

Functions

get_weather_data_from_file(→ pandas.DataFrame)

Reads weather data from a raw weather data NETCDF file obtained from ERA5 Climate Data Store.
recommendation_service.optimization_model.utils.weather_data.get_weather_data_from_file(file_path: pathlib.Path, longitude: float, latitude: float, lib: recommendation_service.data_models.enums.WeatherDataLib) → pandas.DataFrame

Reads weather data from a raw weather data NETCDF file obtained from ERA5 Climate Data Store.

Parameters:

  • file_path (Path) – Path to the NETCDF file containing raw weather data from ERA5 Climate Data Store

  • longitude (float) – longitude of the location to obtain weather data for

  • latitude (float) – latitude of the location to obtain weather data for

  • lib (WeatherDataLib) – Library to obtain weather data for

Returns:

Weather data

Return type:

pd.DataFrame
